issues_found.title: [LLHD] Switch from hw.inout to a custom signal reference type
issues_found.reasoning: Related to LLHD reference types (!llhd.ref<T>) but is a feature request to introduce the type, not a bug report about crashes when using it.

issues_found.title: [circt-verilog][arcilator] Arcilator assertion failure
issues_found.reasoning: Arcilator assertion failure but different root cause (combinational blocks with assertions, not inout ports in sequential logic).

issues_found.title: Arcilator crashes in Upload Release Artifacts CI
issues_found.reasoning: Arcilator crash but appears to be CI-specific, not related to inout ports or StateType.

top_match.reasoning: Issue #8825 discusses introducing !llhd.ref<T> type (which is what causes our crash), but it's a feature request about the type system design, not a bug report about crashes when using inout ports.

summary: No duplicate found. Issue #8825 is related (discusses LLHD reference types) but is a feature request, not a bug report. Our crash is a specific bug: Arc StateType cannot handle !llhd.ref<i1> from inout ports in sequential logic.
